driving.name: Alignment Gates
driving.description: Set up alignment sticks to create a 'gate' that your ball must travel through. Focus on starting the ball on your intended line.

achievements.intermediate: Hit 8 drives through the gate
achievements.advanced: Hit 10 drives through the gate

driving.name: Fairway Focus
driving.description: Pick targets on the range that represent fairways of varying widths. Try to land your drives within these target areas.

achievements.beginner: Land 4 out of 10 drives in the wide fairway
achievements.intermediate: Land 4 out of 10 drives in the medium fairway
achievements.advanced: Land 4 out of 10 drives in the narrow fairway

driving.name: Tempo Trainer
driving.description: Count '1-2-3' for your backswing and '1' for your downswing to develop consistent tempo. Focus on rhythm, not power.

achievements.intermediate: Hit 15 drives with consistent tempo
achievements.advanced: Hit 20 drives with consistent tempo

driving.name: Driver Stress Challenge
driving.description: Set a fairway target on the driving range using bunkers or markers as boundaries. Hit 5 drives into the fairway within a set time limit. If you miss the fairway, perform a physical penalty (e.g., 10 air squats + a sprint). Return and hit your remaining drives within the time frame.

achievements.beginner: Complete the drill with 2/5 drives in the fairway
achievements.intermediate: Complete the drill with 3/5 drives in the fairway
achievements.advanced: Complete the drill with 4/5 or more drives in the fairway

driving.name: Start Line Challenge
driving.description: Choose a target on the range and identify a visual start line window (e.g., a spot left or right of the target). Hit 10 shots aiming to start each shot within the window and curve it toward the target. Score each shot: +1 point for solid contact, +1 point for starting the ball within the window, +1 point for keeping the ball on target.

achievements.intermediate: Score 20 points total across 10 shots
achievements.advanced: Score 25 or more points total across 10 shots

irons.name: Distance Control
irons.description: Pick three targets at different distances. Hit 5 shots to each target, trying to land within 10 yards of each one.

achievements.beginner: Land 3 shots within range of each target
achievements.intermediate: Land 4 shots within range of each target
achievements.advanced: Land all 5 shots within range of each target

irons.name: Trajectory Control
irons.description: Practice hitting low, medium, and high shots with the same iron by adjusting ball position and weight distribution.

achievements.beginner: Successfully hit 2 of each trajectory type
achievements.intermediate: Successfully hit 4 of each trajectory type
achievements.advanced: Successfully hit 6 of each trajectory type

irons.name: One Club Challenge
irons.description: Using only a 7-iron, try to hit shots that would normally require different clubs by varying your swing and setup.

achievements.intermediate: Hit 5 different distances accurately
achievements.advanced: Hit 7 different distances accurately

irons.name: One handed L to L
irons.description: Do the L to L with your lead hand. Set up to the ball with only your lead hand on the club, swing back until your wrist is set and the club makes an L then swing through and hit the ball. Release the club so you make an L on the follow through. Let your arm swing independent of your shoulder socket. Then repeat with your trail arm.

achievements.intermediate: Complete 5 swings with each hand
achievements.advanced: Complete 5 swings with each hand

wedges.name: Clock Drill
wedges.description: Imagine a clock face with your normal shot at 6 o'clock. Practice hitting to 4, 6, and 8 o'clock positions by varying your swing length.

achievements.beginner: Hit 2 shots to each position with proper distance control
achievements.intermediate: Hit 4 shots to each position with proper distance control
achievements.advanced: Hit 6 shots to each position with proper distance control

wedges.name: Landing Zone
wedges.description: Place an alignment stick or towel at your intended landing spot. Practice landing the ball in that specific area to roll close to the hole.

achievements.intermediate: Land 6 shots in the zone
achievements.advanced: Land 9 shots in the zone

wedges.name: Varied Lies Challenge
wedges.description: Practice wedge shots from different lies: uphill, downhill, sidehill, rough, and bare lies to develop versatility.

achievements.beginner: Successfully execute 1 shot from each lie type
achievements.intermediate: Successfully execute 2 shots from each lie type
achievements.advanced: Successfully execute 3 shots from each lie type

wedges.name: Wedge Distance Challenge
wedges.description: Select 3-4 random targets on the range. Guess the distance to each target without using a rangefinder. Hit a shot based on your guess, then check the actual yardage. Adjust and hit to each target using different clubs, experimenting with half, three-quarter, and full swings.

achievements.intermediate: Land within 10 yards of 3 targets
achievements.advanced: Land within 5 yards of all targets

chipping.name: Around the World
chipping.description: Place 6 balls in a circle around a practice green hole. Chip each ball, working your way around the 'world'.

achievements.beginner: Get 2 balls within 3 feet of the hole
achievements.intermediate: Get 4 balls within 3 feet of the hole
achievements.advanced: Get all 6 balls within 3 feet of the hole

chipping.name: Up and Down Challenge
chipping.description: From 10 yards off the green, try to get up and down (chip and one putt) as many times as possible out of 10 attempts.

achievements.intermediate: Complete 5 up and downs
achievements.advanced: Complete 7 up and downs

chipping.name: Leapfrog
chipping.description: Chip your first ball, then try to land each subsequent ball beyond the previous one but closer to the hole.

achievements.beginner: Successfully leapfrog 3 balls in a row
achievements.intermediate: Successfully leapfrog 5 balls in a row
achievements.advanced: Successfully leapfrog 7 balls in a row

putting.name: Ladder Putting Game
putting.description: Start with 3 balls at 3 feet. Progress to 6 feet, then 9 feet after completing each level.

achievements.intermediate: Make 2 putts at each distance
achievements.advanced: Make 3 putts at each distance

putting.name: Clock Drill
putting.description: Place 12 balls in a circle around the hole, like numbers on a clock face, 3-5 feet away. Putt from each position.

achievements.intermediate: Make 7 putts
achievements.advanced: Make 10 putts

putting.name: Gate Drill
putting.description: Create a 'gate' using tees just wider than your putter head, 6 inches in front of the ball. Putt through the gate without hitting the tees.

achievements.beginner: Successfully putt through the gate 5 times
achievements.intermediate: Successfully putt through the gate 8 times
achievements.advanced: Successfully putt through the gate 10 times

bunker.name: Dollar Bill Drill
bunker.description: Place a dollar bill (or paper) in the sand. Try to slide the clubhead under it, splashing the bill out with the sand.

achievements.beginner: Successfully splash out the bill 3 times
achievements.intermediate: Successfully splash out the bill 5 times
achievements.advanced: Successfully splash out the bill 7 times

bunker.name: Line in the Sand
bunker.description: Draw a line in the sand. Practice entering the sand at the line, not before or after it.

achievements.intermediate: Hit the line correctly 6 times
achievements.advanced: Hit the line correctly 8 times

bunker.name: High-Low Challenge
bunker.description: Practice hitting both high, soft bunker shots and low, running bunker shots with the same club by changing your setup and swing.

achievements.beginner: Successfully execute 2 of each shot type
achievements.intermediate: Successfully execute 4 of each shot type
achievements.advanced: Successfully execute 6 of each shot type

full-round.name: Par 18 Challenge
full-round.description: Play 9 holes treating each as a par 2. Your goal is to get up and down from various locations around each green.

achievements.intermediate: Score 21 or better
achievements.advanced: Score 18 or better

full-round.name: 3 Club Challenge
full-round.description: Play 9 holes using only 3 clubs of your choice. Forces creativity and shot-making.

achievements.beginner: Finish within 7 strokes of your normal 9-hole score
achievements.intermediate: Finish within 5 strokes of your normal 9-hole score
achievements.advanced: Finish within 3 strokes of your normal 9-hole score

full-round.name: Worst Ball
full-round.description: Hit two balls from each position and always play the worst one. Great for pressure training.

achievements.intermediate: Finish 9 holes within 10 strokes of your normal score
achievements.advanced: Finish 9 holes within 6 strokes of your normal score
